tests.sic.sST.poisson

Class Poisson2

  • java.lang.Object
    • cern.colt.PersistentObject
      • cern.jet.random.AbstractDistribution
        • cern.jet.random.AbstractDiscreteDistribution
          • cern.jet.random.Poisson
            • tests.sic.sST.poisson.Poisson2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cern.colt.function.DoubleFunction, cern.colt.function.IntFunction, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Poisson2
extends cern.jet.random.Poisson
    auxiliary class to make Poisson computations from the Colt library behave the same as in MATLAB, at least for the purposes needed in this package. NOT part of the public API.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2019

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:
